meanings.definition: Propose as a candidate for election or appointment.
meanings.sent1: She nominates her best friend for class president.
meanings.sent2: The committee nominates three candidates for the job.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly nominates his cat for mayor.
meanings.sent4: The rising star nominates herself for the lead role.
meanings.sent5: The teacher nominates the shy student for an award to boost her confidence.

meanings.definition: Designate someone as a candidate for an honor or award.
meanings.sent1: The organization nominates outstanding volunteers for recognition.
meanings.sent2: They nominate the top student for the scholarship.
meanings.sent3: The little girl nominates her teddy bear as the bravest toy.
meanings.sent4: The chef nominates the new dish for the restaurant's signature item.
meanings.sent5: The coach nominates the hardworking player for the MVP title.
